command: tag @p add self_a
clear @p arx:pallas_gift 0 1
tag @p[tag=self_a, tag=!solve_crystal] add self
tag @p[tag=self_a, tag=solve_crystal] add contrself
tag @p[tag=self, scores={case_counter_pl=0..150}] add case_pallas_score_logged
scoreboard players set @p[tag=self, tag=!case_pallas_score_logged] case_counter_pl 0
tag @p remove case_pallas_score_logged
scoreboard players add @p[tag=self] case_counter_pl 1
scoreboard players set @p[tag=self, scores={case_counter_pl=151}] case_counter_pl 1
title @p[tag=self, scores={case_counter_pl=9}] actionbar §bСледующая молитва Палласа - простой гарант

tag @p[tag=self] remove pallas_garant_b
tag @p[tag=self] remove pallas_garant_c

execute @p[tag=self, tag=!pallas_garant_a, tag=!pallas_garant_b, tag=!pallas_garant_c, scores={case_random=1..57000}] ~ ~ ~ title @p title §7[Обычное]
